Posts.Content: Oct 16, 2006 06:43AM applebar wrote: Hi -- a "survivor " sister of a friend did a basket for me -- it had a set of plastic cutlery, a book on hope, a book of bc facts, warm socks, a peaceful CD, travel tissues, a bag of bland white rice, lemon ginger tea bags, hand sanitizer, lip balm, a deck of cards, and a pack of ginger gum - all in a tupperware box. It was very thoughtful. Mary Ann
